metadata.description:
READOUT OPTIMISATION: FREQUENCY
The sequence consists in measuring the state of the resonator after thermalization (qubit in |g>) and after
playing a pi pulse to the qubit (qubit in |e>) successively while sweeping the readout frequency.
The 'I' & 'Q' quadratures when the qubit is in |g> and |e> are extracted to derive the readout fidelity.
The optimal readout frequency is chosen as to maximize the state discrimination Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR).

Prerequisites:
    - Having calibrated the readout parameters (nodes 02a, 02b and/or 02c).
    - Having calibrated the qubit x180 pulse parameters (nodes 03a_qubit_spectroscopy.py and 04b_power_rabi.py).

State update:
    - The readout frequency: qubit.resonator.f_01 & qubit.resonator.RF_frequency
    - The dispersive shift: qubit.chi
metadata.name: readout_frequency_optimization

qubits.description: A list of qubit names which should participate in the execution of the node. Default is None.
qubits.title: Qubits

multiplexed.description:
Whether to play control pulses, readout pulses and active/thermal reset at the same time for all qubits (True)
or to play the experiment sequentially for each qubit (False). Default is False.
multiplexed.title: Multiplexed

use_state_discrimination.description:
Whether to use on-the-fly state discrimination and return the qubit 'state', or simply return the demodulated
quadratures 'I' and 'Q'. Default is False.
use_state_discrimination.title: Use State Discrimination

reset_type.description:
The qubit reset method to use. Must be implemented as a method of Quam.qubit. Can be "thermal", "active", or
"active_gef". Default is "thermal".
reset_type.title: Reset Type

num_shots.description: Number of averages to perform. Default is 100.
num_shots.title: Num Shots

frequency_span_in_mhz.description: Span of frequencies to sweep in MHz. Default is 10 MHz.
frequency_span_in_mhz.title: Frequency Span In Mhz

frequency_step_in_mhz.description: Step size for frequency sweep in MHz. Default is 0.1 MHz.
frequency_step_in_mhz.title: Frequency Step In Mhz

simulate.description: Simulate the waveforms on the OPX instead of executing the program. Default is False.
simulate.title: Simulate

simulation_duration_ns.description: Duration over which the simulation will collect samples (in nanoseconds). Default is 50_000 ns.
simulation_duration_ns.title: Simulation Duration Ns

use_waveform_report.description: Whether to use the interactive waveform report in simulation. Default is True.
use_waveform_report.title: Use Waveform Report

timeout.description: Waiting time for the OPX resources to become available before giving up (in seconds). Default is 120 s.
timeout.title: Timeout

load_data_id.description: Optional QUAlibrate node run index for loading historical data. Default is None.
load_data_id.title: Load Data Id
